summary: This bill, S. 2432, designates the United States Postal Service facility located at 6444 San Fernando Road in Glendale, California, as the “Paul Ignatius Post Office.” It includes provisions for the official designation and references to the facility, ensuring all relevant documents and records are updated. The bill was introduced in the Senate on July 24, 2025, by Mr. Schiff and Mr. Padilla and was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
